title_zh: 中秋節限定：芋頭奶茶買一送一
excerpt_zh: 限時一週，來店或外帶皆可使用。
body_zh:

body_en:
Taro Milk Tea BOGO is live!

Buy one large taro milk tea, get one free.

title_zh: 新品上市：台式滷肉飯套餐
excerpt_zh: 家常滷肉、半熟蛋與時蔬，外帶友善包裝。
excerpt_en: Comfort pork belly, soft egg, veggies; takeout-friendly.
body_zh:
我們將經典滷肉升級，使用三段式滷法，香而不膩。

搭配半熟蛋與時蔬，營養均衡。
body_en:
Our classic lu-rou-fan is upgraded with 3-stage braise.

Served with soft-boiled egg and seasonal greens.
